DOC.criteria: At least 12 year age Report take least one dose Overthecounter ( OTC ) analgesic pain past month Able read understand English Provide write informed consent ( subject 1217 year age provide write assent and/or parent legal guardian provide write consent ) Provide contact information Have participate trial involve OTC analgesic last 6 month They someone else household work market research company , advertising agency , public relation firm , pharmaceutical company , healthcare professional , part health care practice ( eliminate reason confidentiality increase awareness drug label ) Have history know allergy Nonsteroidal Antiinflammatory Drugs ( NSAIDs ) ( i.e. , naproxen , ibuprofen , acetaminophen , aspirin , etc . ) Have history heart surgery last 60 day plan heart surgery next 60 day Female subject positive urine pregnancy test breastfeeding .
